Name: Slow Comfortable Screw Against a Cold Hard Wall With a Kiss
Ingredients: 15 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Then FLOAT amaretto so it bleeds into drink. Finish with a FLOAT of Galliano and overproof rum.
Review: The float of amaretto adds the "Kiss" to a Slow Comfortable Screw Against a Cold Hard Wall . If this was served in a Tiki mug it would be a Tiki Drink rather than a Disco Drink – it's fruity and boozy, and just edging towards the sweet side with that splash of amaretto adding rich almond notes.
History: Origins and evolution of the "Slow Screw" family of cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of Slow Comfortable Screw Against a Cold Hard Wall With a Kiss contains 312 calories
